item.title: Jus Hurtz ltd
item.description:
About Us

Jus Hurtz ltd specializes in comprehensive finishing works, offering services such as painting, plumbing, electrical installations, tiling, and ceiling design. With a focus on quality and customer satisfaction, we transform spaces through expert layout and design solutions.

Our Services

  • Painting: Professional interior and exterior painting
  • Plumbing: Complete plumbing solutions
  • Electrical: Expert electrical installations
  • Tiling: Professional tiling services
  • Ceiling Design: Custom ceiling installations
  • Layout Design: Comprehensive space planning

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Anthony Da Costa
  • Phone: 323-1155
  • Email: info@jushurtz.com
  • Website: www.jushurtz.com
  • Social Media: Follow us on Facebook
